entity.name: Coronavirus: Human trials for experimental vaccine begin in the US
entity.description:
Pharmaceutical companies Pfizer and BioNTech confirmed the start of human trials for a potential coronavirus vaccine. If successful, the vaccine could be in "emergency use" starting in September, officials say.

text:
A thread about the truth on US #COVID19 testing
1. Timing
The abject failure for the US to start testing when the virus was spreading as compared to South Korea, starting the same day w/ their 1st patients. Result: Profoundly behind the outbreak. No #TestTraceIsolate when no test https://t.co/2HO0x6cNxi
